featured.text: Since that rainy morning in Mill Valley, the World Café approach has been applied to multi-group discussions and cooperative actions by businesses, industries, and educational institutions around the world.

definition.zh_def: 磨坊；磨粉機，通常用於加工穀物或其他材料。
definition.en_def: A building or machine for grinding grain into flour or for processing other materials.
definition.example: The farmer took his wheat to the mill to have it ground into flour.
